adviseScripts.text: {AccountData.NickName}-kun, I've been wanting to know:
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Which type of tea do you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Black tea.
Green tea
Me too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That short burst of bitterness, followed by a faintly sweet aftertaste, wins me over every time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Next time you come to visit, I'll treat you to some black tea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I can certainly see the appeal in green tea,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but I personally have found myself preferring black tea lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk about our favorite types of tea for a while.
{AccountData.NickName}-kun, what would you do if you were the leader of an organization
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: and you couldn't tell if the decision you were making was the right one?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I would believe in myself and keep moving forward.
I'd ask others for their opinion.
You're one tough cookie, that's for sure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You're right. The leader of an organization should have faith in themselves.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Only in this way can the organization be stable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That is one way of going about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But there's an old saying: too many cooks in the kitchen can spoil the broth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It's good if the leader of an organization trusts their own judgment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I have a deep conversation with Sakura.
You really are a gentle soul, {AccountData.NickName}-kun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Are you this way with everyone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: No, only with you.
Generally, yes.
So you only love me and no one else...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way about you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: So love comes easy for you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk more about love and gentleness.
Whenever I see the cherry blossom trees outside the residence,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: all kinds of different emotions well up inside me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: How do you feel when you see them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I feel very excited.
I feel very content.
Same here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It brings joy to my heart whenever I see the cherry blossom petals floating by the trees.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: So gazing at them puts you in a state of relaxation?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I don't know whether it has to do with the time of year, or the cherry blossoms themselves,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but they tend to give me more of a thrilling sense of elation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk about cherry blossom trees.
Lately I've been passing the time enjoying tea and practicing Ikebana.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What about you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I've been studying hard.
I've been exercising.
didn't realize that studying could be considered a hobby.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I see that you haven't been slacking off.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That's good to hear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: If you'd like, you could come and try some Ikebana next time you're free.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I can teach you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I share more information about our hobbies with each other.
I find it troubling that I never seem to have anything to say to Moran.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What would you do if you were me, {AccountData.NickName}-kun?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Keep hammering away at it until something you say makes an impression.
Just give it up.
It's clear that you're a very patient person.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That makes two of us.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless, I feel that in Moran's case, it may be wise to give up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Patience is clearly not one of your virtues.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It is one of mine, but even I think that it may be smarter, in this case, to call it quits.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk about Moran for a while.
What's your favorite flower?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'll prepare some in the courtyard for you for the next time you visit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Roses.
Cherry blossoms.
Roses always remind me of a certain criminal ringleader.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I can't say I'm a big fan of such things,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but if that's what you like, I'll see that it's done.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Ah, cherry blossoms. The snowflakes of spring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Rather than plant them in the courtyard, I always keep them in my most precious vase.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk about our favorite flowers.
Whenever you're dealing with something important,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: what's your general approach?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Stick to the procedure.
Improvise.
That's my preference as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: If only everyone did the same.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Not only would there be fewer accidents, but the final results would be much easier to predict.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: To be sure, no one appreciates a co-worker
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: who freezes whenever the unexpected occurs.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: However, changes are a constant occurrence in almost every facet of life, so I don't like improvising.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I have a deep conversation with Sakura.
I'm curious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What do you look for in a partner?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Someone with grace and sangfroid.
Someone who values loyalty.
Grace and sangfroid...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura smiles.
I like that answer very much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Loyalty?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That reminds me of someone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But I wish it wasn't her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Sakura about our favorite types.
When I was out at the mall shopping today, I stopped by to see a fortune teller.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: When she read my fortune, she mentioned your name. What do you think that means?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It certainly sounds positive to me.
I've never put much faith in fortune-telling.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: ... Yeah, maybe that was what the fortune teller meant.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to go see her again sometime.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: So you don't think there's any truth to fortune-telling?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Actually, neither do I.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But still, it was nice to hear that you were a part of my future.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Sakura about fortune-telling for a while.
Most of my time is spent here inside my residence.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Every once in a while, I do miss being able to hang out with my friends.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But I can't go out and leave my work unattended.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hand over your work to a trusted subordinate and have some fun out on the town.
How about I come visit and keep you company?
I've considered it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but if people saw the leader of a criminal organization idling about in the streets all the time,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: it'd be quite a scandal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It's like you read my mind!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I was hoping that's how you'd respond.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk about more indoor activities.
{AccountData.NickName}-kun,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: your clothes are so disheveled.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It's hardly appropriate for someone in your position to look that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Belorta played a prank on me. There was nothing I could do.
I know. I'm so helpless. Help meeeee, pretty please with a cherry on top?
How can you expect those under you to understand their leader displaying such weakness?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: A leader must be a pillar of strength.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You're really laying it on thick.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: However...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You've performed many valuable services for me before, so I'll let you get away with it just this once.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura leans in and straightens my tie.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Sakura about how to wear a uniform correctly.
Hypothetically speaking,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: if you had feelings for someone,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: how would you express yourself to her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I think I'd talk to her face to face.
I wouldn't say anything, and keep my feelings hidden.
As would I.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Whatever I want, I take.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I think this is the mentality that any leader worth their salt should have.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I didn't realize you were so tentative.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What if the opportunity passed you by? Things might end up far worse than you'd imagined.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I speak with Sakura about how to profess your feelings of love to someone.
I'm looking for books to read while having my tea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any recommendations?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: The Mafia's Youngest Son
The Mistress and Her Dog.
The protagonist of that book is mysteriously reborn as the youngest son of a mafia leader.
He proceeds to defeat his rival siblings while vying for power, and eventually becomes the leader of the organization.
Um...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It doesn't sound like something I could really identify with.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That book is about the right-hand man of a criminal leader.
He falls in love with the leader's daughter, and becomes despondent because he doesn't know what to do.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: If the protagonist made it all the way to right-hand man, he's no spring chicken.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But if you recommend it, I'll check it out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It's been a while since I read a fictional story.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I both concentrate on the books we're reading.
My subordinates have been screwing up left and right lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I've had to make my punishments more severe,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but I don't feel terribly comfortable while I'm doing it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: The consequences of one's actions, both good and bad, should always be clear.
You expect too much of them. Take it easy on them.
You're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I thought I had grown used to playing the disciplinarian role but apparently that's not the case.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: ... Yeah.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But isn't that even more disrespectful to them, in a way?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Sakura about the mentality of being a leader.
So many different emotions well up inside me when I see the cherry blossoms bloom.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Early spring is the best season to recite haikus.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What goes through your mind when you see the first cherry blossoms of the year?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'm reminded of both the splendor and impermanence of life.
I think about Sakura.
I can see why you would feel that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Once they bloom, cherry blossoms fade away almost immediately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Wait...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: are you talking about me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
Perhaps I shouldn't have asked this question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Your response really... has me flustered.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura teaches me some old-time haikus.
My family tells me that when I was a child,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I would always frolic under the cherry blossoms.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Now my memory is all a blur. I can't remember anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But, whenever I see cherry blossoms, that feeling of excitement comes rushing back.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any memorable childhood memories, {AccountData.NickName}-kun?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Actually, I can't remember anything either.
The hospital.
... I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That's too bad. For the both of us.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Oh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: So you were a sickly child?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Well, I'm glad you've grown up to become much stronger.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I flip through her album of childhood photos.
You really are inscrutable, {AccountData.NickName}-kun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes you're weak, and others you're strong.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Other times, you're incredibly gentle.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That's a side of myself I feel I'm unable to access.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: How can I access that gentler side of myself?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It's also important to be comfortable with who you are.
Do you want to practice with me?
Thank you for saying that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You've made me feel much more confident.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Try to be gentle with me first.
Are you sure this will work?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You may find this hard to believe,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but I've been trying to be as kind to you as possible this entire time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I have a heart-to-heart with Sakura.
I found a new confectionery shop.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: The treats there come in all sorts of shapes: flowers, animals, human faces, and kinds of unique formations.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: They've got lots of materials their customers can use to create their own confections.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Why don't we go and buy some sometime?
Why don't we go and make some together?
Sure!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Let me know when you're free, and I'll clear up my schedule.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sorry,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but I'm not all that interested in cooking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Especially with the kind of confections they have at that shop. There's a lot involved in making them, so I don't think I'll go.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I check out the shop's webpage.
I'm the only one who uses Ichigenkin anymore.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless, it's a family heirloom.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It feels like a part of me, so I've kept it all this time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever fired a matchlock rifle, {AccountData.NickName}-kun?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: No, I've only seen them in a museum.
I haven't, but I'd love to.
I'm not surprised.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That is the typical response I get from people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to try aiming with it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura hands me her gun.
Although it's an ancient relic, it's been modified for Nikkes, so it's heavy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Let me help you lift it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura clasps my hand in hers as she slowly lifts the gun up.
What's wrong? Why do you seem so startled?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: ... Nothing. It's just a bit difficult to aim, that's all.
I listen to Sakura as she goes over the matchlock rifle in detail.
